title: Mazel Tov Black Lou (feat. Andy Fiori)
description:
Black Lou has some HUGE news. Andy Fiori joins his old show to look at a young ladies dance team choreographed by drag queen on America's Got Talent and a story of a woman who's surgeon husband divorced her for secretly turning tricks behind his back!

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire 

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM 

@DanSoder www.DanSoder.com 

@BigJayOakerson www.BigJayComedy.com 

@andyfiori www.andyfiori.com

#CrackleCrackle
